title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 125 - Credit For Reinsurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 125 - Credit For Reinsurance

State Regulations
§ 125.1 - Preamble and applicability
§ 125.2 - Definitions
§ 125.3 - Principles of prudent reinsurance credit risk management
§ 125.4 - Credit for reinsurance involving risks other than life, annuity and accident and health from unauthorized insurers
§ 125.5 - Credit for reinsurance involving the risks of life, annuity and accident and health from unauthorized insurers
§ 125.6 - Additional conditions for credit
§ 125.7 - Certificate of recognition
§ 125.8 - Annual filing and processing charge
§ 125.9 - Credit taken under certain conditions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 125

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§ 110, 201, 301, 307[a], 308, 332, 1301 [a][9], [14], [c], 1308

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
